basics.name: Arthur Acenas
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Security Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI

work.company: Pacific Air Forces HQ - A1 Manpower, Personnel and Services
work.summary: Work under A1M (Manpower) to help manage organizational structures
highlights: Scan and digitize historical USAF documents into PDF form
Archive digital documents into an Excel spreadsheet record log

work.company: University of Hawaii at Mānoa - Information Technology Services
work.summary: Assist in troubleshooting and diagnosing network connectivity issues using cable testing and network diagnostic tools
highlights: Install and maintain network equipment and cabling, ensuring proper installation documentation
Conduct on-site visits to resolve user-reported network problems utilizing specialized testing tools

volunteer.summary: Code in Java/C++ to design robot behavior/controls

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
